tool_description: Scans physical documents to create digital images with configurable resolution and color settings for genealogy records.

resolution_dpi.description: Scanning resolution in dots per inch (150-600 DPI)

color_mode.description: Color mode for scanning: color, grayscale, or black_white

document_type.description: Type of document being scanned: certificate, letter, photo, ledger, or manuscript

error_messages: Invalid resolution: DPI must be between 150 and 600 for optimal quality vs file size balance.
Invalid document type: Use one of [certificate, letter, photo, ledger, manuscript].
Scanner not detected: Ensure scanner is connected and powered on.
Document feeder empty: Load documents into the scanner feeder.
usage: Set resolution_dpi based on document quality needs (300+ for detailed text), choose appropriate color_mode for document type, and specify document_type for optimal scanning settings.

image_path.description: File path to the scanned image

file_size_mb.description: Size of scanned file in megabytes

scan_timestamp.description: When the scan was completed in ISO 8601 format
